lead_paragraph: The European Union tightened sanctions on Russia on Friday over its role in the Ukrainian conflict, restricting access to financing for top Russian banks, defense and energy firms and freezing the assets of senior politicians and rebel leaders.

headline.main: EU Raises Pressure on Moscow With Tougher Sanctions
headline.print_headline: EU Raises Pressure on Moscow With Tougher Sanctions

snippet: The European Union tightened sanctions on Russia on Friday over its role in the Ukrainian conflict, restricting access to financing for top Russian banks, defense and energy firms and freezing the assets of senior politicians and rebel leaders....
